### Requirements

This is a workshop completely for beginners- no coding or machine learning experience is needed. However, participants should have both R and RStudio installed prior to the workshop. They should also be provided with my GitHub repository link with all of the supplementary notes for the workshop: https://github.com/diramputri/Data-Science-Workshops.

Installing R: https://cran.cnr.berkeley.edu/

Installing RStudio (select RStudio Desktop - open source license): https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/

### Time

About 1.5 - 2 hours

### Structure

* Introductions

* Getting Started in R: Basic Functions and Installing Packages/Libraries

* Simple Linear Regression

* Multiple Linear Regression

* Logistic Regression

* Cross-Validation and Bootstrap

* Case Studies: Applying New Knowledge!
